settings.title: Shipping
settings.content: In stock items are shipped within 2 business days!

settings.title: Race now, pay later
settings.content: We offer Afterpay, Zip Pay and PayPal Pay in 4 so you can pay your way and get on the Trak faster than ever!

The FS3 is an entry-level and extremely rigid wheel stand that has had several upgrades from customer feedback. From 2017 onward, the FS3 was globally, the most preferred entry-level wheel stand in the market and now, itâ€™s the preferred entry level Flight wheel stand. It ticks all of the boxes for a Flight Wheel Stand Rig that assembles in under 30 minutes. It's Strong, Adjustable, and has an array of genuine Trak Racer add-ons to personalize the stand.

settings.title: Left and Right Side Mounts Included
settings.content: With all the adjustment you need for your left and right-side flight controls from any major brand, youâ€™ll be able to hit the skies in absolute comfort.

settings.title: Secure and Adjustable
settings.content: If youâ€™re a serious flight sim operator, then you have a flight yoke. Mount it up directly onto the yoke platform on the Trak Racer wheel stand and adjust as required into the most comfortable position.

settings.title: Rigidity and Fine-Tune Adjustment
settings.content: Mount your rudders directly onto the pedal baseplate of the FS3 Flight Stand and adjust the position on the micro side slider or angle to get it into the perfect position.

settings.title: More Adjustable and Strengthened Wheel Mount
settings.content: We have added a wheel mount micro-tune slide to the FS3 Sim Stand to give you forward and back adjustment. We have also strengthened the 2" tube to withstand up to 8nm direct drive steering wheel torque without flex.

settings.title: More Adjustable and Strengthened Left or Right Side Shifter Mount
settings.content: The shifter mount has been strengthened by increasing the thickness of the mount and also the plate on the simulator stand that it mounts to. We have even added mounting points to enable the shifter mount to move forwards and back.

settings.title: Strengthened Pedal Plate
settings.content: The FS3 has been improved to withstand up to heavier braking forces without flex. We have also added pre-drilled mounting points for more new pedal sets on the market and the slide function on the FS3 remains - so you can get those pedals exactly where you need them!

settings.title: Trak Racer FS3 Flight Stand Overview
settings.subtitle: Sub title
settings.content:
• Compatible with PC and Console
  • Compatible with all popular Flight Yoke, Rudders and Flight Controls as well as steering wheels, pedals and shifters on the market
  • Improved Left and Right Side Flight Control Mounts and a Gear Shift is included with pre-drilled mounting points and slide function for Sim Racing
  • Reinforced Angle and Distance Adjustable Pedal Mount, suitable for all the big brands!
  • Upgraded 3-Point adjustable steering wheel mount with slide
  • Superior build quality, stability and comfort
  • Designed and Engineered in Australia

settings.title: Frame/Chassis Features
settings.subtitle: Sub title
settings.content:
• Adjustable Height
  • Rigid Frame Constructed from Premium Materials
  • Folds up to a Compact Size for Storage
  • Wide Leg Stance - Suitable for Office Chairs!
  • 650mm wide for firm stance when racing
  • Hard-Wood Floor Safe Feet
  • Finished in high-grade steel tubing
  • Folds away in a matter of Seconds

settings.title: Adjustable Pedal Mount Features
settings.subtitle: Sub title
settings.content:
• Pre-drilled mounting points for all major brand rudders and sim racing pedals
  • Angle Adjustable with Realistic Inclined Angle
  • Distance Slider for perfect ergonomics
  • Compatible with PC, PS3, PS4, PS5, XBOX 360, XBOX One, Wii and more

settings.title: Adjustable Wheel Mount Features
settings.subtitle: Sub title
settings.content:
• Solid construction
  • Pre-drilled mounting points for all major brand yokes and sim racing wheel bases
  • 3-Point Adjustment allows you to adjust the height and angle of the mount
  • Distance Slider for perfect ergonomics

settings.title: What's Included
settings.subtitle: Sub title
settings.content:
• High Quality Chassis with Assembly Instructions
  • Left and Right Side Flight Sim mounts
  • Left/Right Adjustable Gear Shifter Mount
  • Angle and Height Adjustable Wheel Mount
  • Angle Adjustable Pedal Mount
  • Tools and Screws for Assembly

settings.title: Take to the skies with an official AIRBUS partner!
settings.subtitle: Sub title
settings.content: Trak Racer, a pioneer in building sim racing and flight cockpits since 2008, became the Official and Trusted Simulator Supplier to Alpine F1 and Airbus Aircraft in 2020. Trak Racer simulators are used by Alpine F1 Team and Alpine Academy drivers like Esteban Ocon, Victor Martins (Formula 3) and Caio Collet (Formula 3) and first choice flight simulator for Airbus!Â Trak Racer is the Official Simulator Supplier to Alpine F1 Team and Airbus Aircraft.
